content: ऊर्जः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the month Kārtika (as giving vigour and energy); <ls>Śi. 6. 50.</ls> {@--2@} Energy. {@--3@} Power, strength. {@--4@} Procreative power. {@--5@} Life, breath. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of the sons of हिरण्यगर्भ (reckoned among the seven Ṛṣis of the third Manvantara). --र्जा {@--1@} Food. {@--2@} Energy. {@--3@} Strength, sap. {@--4@} Growth. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a daughter of Dakṣa and wife of Vasiṣṭha. --र्जं Water.
